Group< N > Class Template Reference
Chemical Structure

Detailed Description

template<int N>
class DdMd::Group< N >

A group of covalently interacting atoms.

A group of atoms that interact via a permanent (covalent) N Atom potential. Specializations of Group with N=2, 3, 4 are used to represent groups that interact via covalent bond, angle and torsion interaction potentials, respectively.

A Group<N> contains both an array of integer ids for Atoms in the group, and an array of pointers to these atoms. It also has an integer type Id for the group and a global id.

Definition at line 43 of file ddMd/chemistry/Group.h.
